strings.SS2_MULE_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so it left, engine sputtering, directive finally fulfilled.
strings.SS2_MULE_OUTRO_FAILURE: ..and so it vanished, finally put out of commission.
strings.SS2_MULE_KEYWORD_OVERCLOCKING: <style=cKeywordName>Overclocking</style></style=cSub>Hold the button to extend the skill's duration, but also extend the skill's cooldown length.</sub>
strings.SS2_MULE_KEYWORD_OVERCLOCKING2: <style=cKeywordName>Overclocking</style></style=cSub>Hold the button to charge the skill further, but also extend the skill's cooldown length.</sub>
strings.SS2_MULE_PASSIVE_DRONE_DESC: Taking damage to below <style=cIsHealth>25% health</style>activates your personal <style=cIsHealing>Repair Drone</style>, healing for <style=cIsHealing>50%</style> of your health. Has a <style=cIsUtility>60</style> second cooldown.
strings.SS2_MULE_SLAM_DESC: <style=cIsDamage>Tap</style> to punch enemies for <style=cIsDamage>280% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Hold</style> to charge up a mighty slam, dealing up to <style=cIsDamage>1200%</style> damage and creating a shockwave for <style=cIsDamage>400%</style>.
strings.SS2_MULE_PUNCH_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Overclocking</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Stunning</style>. Wind up, and throw a mighty punch forward for <style=cIsDamage>280% damage</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Damage is multiplied by charge level, up to 4x</style>.
strings.SS2_MULE_JUMP_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Hold to charge</style> a powerful upwards leap.
strings.SS2_MULE_SPIN_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Overclocking</style>. Rapidly spin, gradually increasing <style=cIsUtility>movement speed</style> and <style=cIsUtility>increasing armor</style> while dealing <style=cIsDamage>100% damage</style> per rotation.
strings.SS2_MULE_NET_DESC: Launch a <style=cIsUtility>net</style>, holding enemies within <style=cIsUtility>12m</style> of impact in place and preventing them from attacking for <style=cIsUtility>5</style> seconds. <style=cIsUtility>Flying enemies are grounded</style>.
